orgin:
[00:10]You were spoiled rotten and turned stale like all your plans
[00:14]My tongue's acquired tolerance for tastes I couldn't stand
[00:20]You've been stuck in a rut and a wasteland, drowned in swamps below your feet
[00:28]So just trust me, you'll be just fine
[00:34]I need your trust just for tonight
[00:38]This is not a place in my head
[00:42]Reach out your hands and tell me just what you feel
[00:50]This is not just all in your head
[00:53]Mind over matter makes these things feel so real
[01:04]I can see the doubt in your eyes
[01:08]You say there's no such thing as better things in life
[01:15]Well, I must confess this is all too new for me
[01:20]A whole new world, a whole new world to see
[01:25]Trust me, you'll be just fine
[01:29]I need your trust just for tonight
[01:35]This is not a place in my head
[01:39]Reach out your hands and tell me just what you feel
[01:46]This is not just all in your head
[01:49]Mind over matter makes these things feel so real
[01:56]Keep an open mind, it brings open hearts and open eyes
[02:06]You walk around with your hands out, and I've never seen anyone so blind
[02:15]This is not a place in my head
[02:19]Reach out your hands and tell me just what you feel
[02:26]This is not just all in your head
[02:30]Mind over matter makes these things feel so real
[02:36]This is not a place in my head
[02:40]Reach out your hands and tell me just what you feel
[02:46]This is not just all in your head
[02:50]Mind over matter makes these things feel so real
trans:
[by:奔藏]
[00:10]你变得判若两人  就如其他人那样
[00:14]舌尖唯余捉摸不透的苦涩
[00:20]你被困在苍凉的荒废  深陷困境
[00:28]可你若相信我 那么你就能解脱
[00:34]今晚我需要你的信任
[00:38]它深处脑海
[00:42]尝试去触摸 去感受
[00:50]它并不虚无
[00:53]某些事情使它分外真实
[01:04]我看到你眼中的不信任
[01:08]你说 现实生活中不可能存在
[01:15]或许吧  这确实太新奇
[01:20]全新的世界 全新的认知
[01:25]可请相信我 你会过的更好
[01:29]只要今晚
[01:35]它深处脑海
[01:39]尝试去触摸 去感受
[01:46]它并不虚无
[01:49]因精神高于物质 使它不再虚无
[01:56]秉承开阔的胸怀 它会使我们看到全新的世界
[02:06]可你挥动双臂拒绝  为何如此盲目
[02:15]它深处脑海
[02:19]尝试去触摸 去感受
[02:26]它并不虚无
[02:30]只要用心感悟  它不会再虚无
[02:36]它深处脑海
[02:40]尝试去触摸 去感受
[02:46]它并不虚无
[02:50]只要用心感悟  它不会再虚无
merge:
